description: The new Devold® Kløvstien Mountain Biking series consists of loose fitted, soft, durable, and comfortable garments. The shirts are knitted in a Wool-Tencel blend with high durability and good elasticity – especially designed for high-intensity biking in the mountain. Choose between a characteristic camouflage pattern or a rough looking mélange pattern. The shirts are loose fitted and the Tencel yarn in the jacquard knit, gives the shirts a silky soft and smooth feeling against warm summer skin. The shirts are equipped with a classic round neck and has either short or long sleeves. The shirt with long sleeves will protect the elbows. On the inside of the shirts and t-shirts – marked with a reflective sign on the outside – you find a linen cloth which can be used to dry off dusty biking glasses. The shirts are designed with mesh panels under arms to optimize ventilation.
name: Devold Klovstien Merino Tee - Mens
